entry.title: Bingo! Tedhe Medhe Masala Tadka 90g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bingo! Tedhe Medhe
Type: Foods
Price: 20.00

Craving some masala to shake things up? A pack of Bingo! Tedhe Medhe Masala Tadka will satisfy your ‘something masaledaar’ craving. With no two stick alike in the pack, it will give you something new and delightful with every bite and leave you wanting for more. The desi flavour, handpicked spices and special aroma added to the snack will keep making you Eat, Phir Repeat on loop

  • Add a masaledaar twist to your everyday with Bingo! Tedhe Medhe as no two sticks are alike!


  • Made from dal, corn and rice, this spindle-shaped snack has a unique texture which gives it a delicious crunch.


  • Take one bite of this masala tadka flavour and you won’t just stop at one. It will keep making you Eat Phir Repeat, on loop

entry.title: Mad Angles Rs.50 Pizza
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bingo! Mad Angles
Type: Foods
Price: 50.00

Brought all the way from Italy an authentic flavour of pizza; one bite of Bingo! Mad Angles Pizza Flavour and you’ll be belting like an Italian soprano! With each bite of this deliciously crunchy snack you’ll be saying Mamma Mia! Dig into the pack to experience the perfectly balanced taste of crunchy Bingo! Mad Angles Pizza Flavour. Whether you’re bored in a meeting, video-chatting with your friends or waiting for your movie to buffer. They are just incomplete without a bag of Bingo! Mad Angles by your side. Made from a corn base, Bingo! Mad Angles is cooked with rice and flour. This uniquely textured triangular chips will give you a satisfying crunch with every bite

  • Can’t seem to get enough of pizza? No worries. You can now enjoy it in the form of a snack as well!
  • Just pop open a pack and experience the delicious flavour of pizza bursting with every crunchy bite of Bingo! Mad Angles Pizza.
  • Perfect triangular shape with the lip-smacking flavour of everyone’s favourite food – Pizza. Mamma Mia!
  • Made from a corn base, the unique texture of Bingo! Mad Angles adds to the crunchy fun.
  • Satisfy your snack cravings anytime, anywhere with yummy Mad Angles Pizza Flavour

entry.title: Bingo! Mad Angles Achaari Masti 130g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bingo! Mad Angles
Type: Foods
Price: 50.00

Made from a corn base, Bingo! Mad Angles are cooked with rice and flour. The authentic taste of achaar is added which gives a delightful taste to the uniquely textured crunchy chips. Reminiscent of your Dadi’s mango pickles stored in a white and brown ceramic barni, the taste of Achaari Masti will transport you to those good ol’ days with each bite.
Dig in the pack of this desi flavoured Mad Angles and satisfy your snack cravings anytime, anywhere. Whether you’re bored in a meeting, waiting for your favourite team to score the winning goal or having a party. They are just incomplete without a bag of Bingo! Mad Angles by your side

  • Tired of going around in circles? Eat Bingo! Mad Angles. Enjoy the desi flavour of mango pickles in the form of deliciously crunchy triangle chips.
  • Perfect triangular shape with the lip-smacking flavour of your Dadi’s Achaar; Bingo! Mad Angles chips will give you desi nostalgia with every bite.
  • Made from a corn base, the unique texture of Bingo! Mad Angles adds to the crunchy fun
  • Crunchy and super tasty from every angle, Achaari Masti has a balanced flavour.
  • Satisfy your snack cravings anytime, anywhere with yummy Mad Angles Achaari Masti

Vendor: Bingo! Mad Angles

Price: 50.00

entry.title: Bingo! Mad Angles Cheese Nachos 60g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bingo! Mad Angles
Type: Foods
Price: 20.00

Bingo! Mad Angles Cheese Nachos is the perfect solution for your snack cravings at any time of the day. Crunchy nachos and cheesy goodness come together to create the madness that Bingo! Mad Angles are best known for. Your taste buds are in for a treat once you crack open a pack of Bingo! Mad Angles Cheese Nachos.

Key Information

  • Main Ingredients: The lip-smacking and crispy Bingo! Mad Angles Cheese Nachos are predominantly corn-based. They have an irresistible seasoning of tasty and savoury cheese, and does not contain any artificial flavours.
  • Suitable For: Bingo! Mad Angles Cheese Nachos are an instant and easy solution for all your snacking needs. If you relish and truly love a plate of cheesy nachos, Bingo! Mad Angles Cheese Nachos will be your ideal companion whenever hunger pangs start to bother you.
  • Usage: The cheesy and crunchy magic of Bingo! Mad Angles is ready for you, anytime and anywhere. All you need to do is open the pack of Bingo! Mad Angles Cheese Nachos, reach inside and grab a mad angle! It’s simple, it’s yummy, its Bingo! Mad Angles.
  • Quantity: This pack of Bingo! Mad Angles Cheese Nachos weighs 60g. The quantity is ideal for an individual to enjoy by themselves and satisfy their cravings instantly.

Bingo! Mad Angles is available in a wide variety of delicious flavours inspired by real foods such as the Achaari Masti, Very Peri Peri, Chaat Masti and more. The Bingo! Mad Angles Cheese Nacho flavour is a delightful new addition into the Bingo! family. Each bite of Bingo! Mad Angles Cheese Nachos is bursting with flavour, turning every snack moment into a fiesta of flavours in your mouth. Nachos and cheese are one of the most fantastic food pairings. With Bingo! Mad Angles Cheese Nachos, your taste buds are in for a real treat. The crisp corn based Mad Angles nachos, and the scrumptious cheese seasoning will make you go wow like never before.

entry.title: Bingo! Tedhe Medhe Namkeens Aloo Bhujia, 180 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bingo! Tedhe Medhe
Type: Foods
Price: 45.00

Bingo! Tedhe Medhe Aloo Bhujia and evening chai! Is there a better combination? Yes! Whenever the mood strikes pop open a pack of chatpata namkeen and satisfy your cravings. Sneak a bite during your boring class or munch on them during your long commute. Dig into the pack to make your evenings masaledaar or your house party exciting. Whatever the occasion, Tedhe Medhe Aloo Bhujia is the perfect snack.

Made from only the best of ingredients, Bingo! Tedhe Medhe Aloo Bhujia now comes in a much tastier and crunchier avatar. It is low in sugar and is a source of dietary fibre and protein. So, what are you waiting for? Get the pack and add a Tedhe Medhe twist to your snack time!

  • Craving something tasty and crunchy? Pop open a pack of Bingo! Tedhe Medhe Aloo Bhujia. 
  • Savour your all-time favourite namkeen, but only in a much tastier and crunchier avatar with Bingo! Tedhe Medhe Aloo Bhujia. 
  • Made from only the best of ingredients, this crunchy masaledaar namkeen will give you a delectable taste in every bite. 
  • Satisfy your craving for something chatpata with Bingo! Tedhe Medhe Aloo Bhujia. 
  • From house-parties to just chilling, from your regular tea-time to last-minute plans, Bingo! Tedhe Medhe Aloo Bhujia adds a Tedhe Medhe twist to your day.

entry.title: ITC Master Chef Chicken Breast Strips
entry.summary:
Vendor: ITC Master Chef Frozen Snacks
Type: Frozen Snacks
Price: 306.00

A golden crunchy coating on tender, fresh chicken breast strip combined with a garlic seasoning create a classic favourite. Can be used as an appetizer with an exciting dip or as a ﬁlling for a wrap/roll.

  • Juicy inside, crispy outside
  • Air Fry: Product brushed with oil, kept at 200° C for 8-10 mins. Shake in between.  Bake: In a preheated oven at 220°C for 6-8 mins on a tray brushed with oil. Flip at half time.                                                                                                                      Shallow Fry: For 3 to 4 mins on medium flame. Flip occasionally until crisp and golden.                                                                                                                    Deep Fry: For 2 to 3 mins on medium flame until crisp and golden.
  • Cooking time may vary depending on equipment, Voltage or temperature of oil
  • Always store in deep freezer at -18° C or below. DO NOT THAW.

entry.title: ITC Master Chef Chilli Garlic Chicken Fingers
entry.summary:
Vendor: ITC Master Chef Frozen Snacks
Type: Frozen Snacks
Price: 247.50

A spicy twist to the usual - this combination of chicken with garlic seasoning, white pepper and red chilli ﬂakes is simply the best choice. Serve as is or spice it up with chilli sauce in a wrap/roll.

  • Air Fry: Product brushed with oil, kept at 200° C for 8-10 mins. Shake in between.
  • Bake: In a preheated oven at 220°C for 6-8 mins on a tray brushed with oil. Flip at half time. Shallow Fry: For 3 to 4 mins on medium flame. Flip occasionally until crisp and golden.
  • Deep Fry: For 2 to 3 mins on medium flame until crisp and golden.
  • Cooking time may vary depending on equipment, Voltage or temperature of oil
  • Always store in deep freezer at -18° C or below. DO NOT THAW.
